doc.title: I-59 South
doc.plot: I-59 South is an action/thriller about a young man who robs a bank, goes on a "leapfrogging" murder spree in his getaway, and lands in New Orleans where he plans to live the high-life under an assumed name. After meeting an attractive lady journalist who is visiting the Big Easy, his past gets the better of him and he decides to tell her about it as if the story of a friend of his. The two fall in love; however, as time goes by and clues crop up, she begins to believe he may actually be speaking about himself. Should she turn the man she loves in?
